content:
The chunk initializes a hidden, borderless popup window component (`self._popup`) using `createcomponent`, which will later be displayed when interacting with the scale widget to provide extended controls.

self._popup = self.createcomponent(
                'popup',
                (), None,
                tk.Toplevel, (interior,),
                relief = tk.RAISED, borderwidth = 2)
            self._popup.withdraw()
            self._popup.overrideredirect(1)
